plausibledeniability.create_password_explanation: Password for the fake storage should not match the password for your main storage.
plausibledeniability.help: Under certain circumstances, you might be forced to disclose a password. To keep your coins safe, BlueWallet can create another encrypted storage with a different password. Under pressure, you may disclose this password to a third party. If entered in BlueWallet, it will unlock a new “fake” storage. This will seem legit to the third party, but it will secretly keep your main storage with coins safe.
plausibledeniability.help2: The new storage will be fully functional, and you can store some minimum amounts there so that it looks more believable.
plausibledeniability.password_should_not_match: Password is currently in use. Please try a different password.
plausibledeniability.title: Plausible Deniability

pleasebackup.ask: Have you saved your wallet’s backup phrase? This backup phrase is required to access your funds in case you lose this device. Without the backup phrase, your funds will be permanently lost.
pleasebackup.text:
Please take a moment to write down this mnemonic phrase on a piece of paper.
It’s your backup and you can use it to recover the wallet.
pleasebackup.text_lnd: Please save this wallet backup. It allows you to restore the wallet in case of loss.
pleasebackup.title: Your wallet has been created.

receive.bip47_explanation: Payment codes are a universal address that avoids disclosing your wallet addresses. Not all services will support them.

settings.about_free: BlueWallet is a free and open-source project. Crafted by Bitcoin users.
settings.block_explorer_invalid_custom_url: The URL provided is invalid. Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://.
settings.about_selftest_electrum_disabled: Self-testing is not available with Electrum Offline Mode. Please disable offline mode and try again.
settings.about_selftest_ok: All internal tests have passed successfully. The wallet works well.
settings.privacy_temporary_screenshots_instructio: Screen capture protection will be turned off for this session, allowing you to take screenshots. Once you close and reopen the app, the protection will be automatically turned back on.
settings.biometrics_no_longer_available: Your device settings have changed and no longer match the selected security settings in the app. Please re-enable biometrics or passcode, then restart the app to apply these changes.
settings.biom_10times: You have attempted to enter your password 10 times. Would you like to reset your storage? This will remove all wallets and decrypt your storage.
settings.biom_no_passcode: Your device does not have a passcode or biometrics enabled. In order to proceed, please configure a passcode or biometric in the Settings app.
settings.biom_remove_decrypt: All your wallets will be removed and your storage will be decrypted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.currency_fetch_error: There was an error while obtaining the rate for the selected currency.
settings.default_desc: When disabled, BlueWallet will immediately open the selected wallet at launch.
settings.electrum_error_connect: Cannot connect to the provided Electrum server
settings.electrum_offline_description: When enabled, your Bitcoin wallets will not attempt to fetch balances or transactions.
settings.electrum_saved: Your changes have been saved successfully. Restarting BlueWallet may be required for the changes to take effect.
settings.set_electrum_server_as_default: Set {server} as the default Electrum server?
settings.set_lndhub_as_default: Set {url} as the default LNDhub server?
settings.electrum_preferred_server_description: Enter the server you want your wallet to use for all Bitcoin activities. Once set, your wallet will exclusively use this server to check balances, send transactions, and fetch network data. Ensure you trust this server before setting it.
settings.electrum_reset_to_default: This will let BlueWallet randomly choose a server from the server list.
settings.electrum_reset_to_default_and_clear_hist: Reset to default and clear history
settings.encrypt_decrypt_q: Are you sure you want to decrypt your storage? This will allow your wallets to be accessed without a password.
settings.encrypt_storage_explanation_description_: Enabling Storage Encryption adds an extra layer of protection to your app by securing the way your data is stored on your device. This makes it harder for anyone to access your information without permission.

However, it's important to know that this encryption only protects the access to your wallets stored on the device's keychain. It doesn't put a password or any extra protection on the wallets themselves.
settings.set_as_preferred_electrum: Setting {host}:{port} as preferred server will disable connecting to a suggested server at random.
settings.encrypted_feature_disabled: This feature cannot be used with encrypted storage enabled.
settings.encrypt_use_expl: {type} will be used to confirm your identity before making a transaction, unlocking, exporting, or deleting a wallet. {type} will not be used to unlock encrypted storage.
settings.biometrics_fail: If {type} is not enabled, or fails to unlock, you can use your device passcode as an alternative.
settings.general_continuity_e: When enabled, you will be able to view selected wallets, and transactions, using your other Apple iCloud connected devices.
settings.groundcontrol_explanation: GroundControl is a free, open-source push notifications server for Bitcoin wallets. You can install your own GroundControl server and put its URL here to not rely on BlueWallet’s infrastructure. Leave blank to use GroundControl’s default server.
settings.language_isRTL: Restarting BlueWallet is required for the language orientation to take effect.
settings.lightning_saved: Your changes have been saved successfully.
settings.lightning_settings_explain: To connect to your own LND node, please install LNDhub and put its URL here in settings. Please note that only wallets created after saving changes will connect to the specified LNDhub.
settings.electrum_suggested_description: When a preferred server is not set, a suggested server will be selected for use at random.
settings.password_explain: Enter the password you will use to unlock your storage.
settings.privacy_quickactions_explanation: Touch and hold the BlueWallet app icon to quickly view your wallet’s balance.
settings.privacy_clipboard_explanation: Provide shortcuts if an address or invoice is found in your clipboard.
settings.privacy_do_not_track_explanation: Performance and reliability information will not be submitted for analysis.
settings.push_notifications_explanation:
By enabling notifications, your device token will be sent to the server, along with wallet addresses and transaction IDs for all wallets and transactions made after enabling notifications. The device token is used to send notifications, and the wallet information allows us to notify you about incoming Bitcoin or transaction confirmations.

Only information from after you enable notifications is transmitted—nothing from before is collected.

Disabling notifications will remove all of this information from the server. Additionally, deleting a wallet from the app will also remove its associated information from the server.
settings.success_transaction_broadcasted: Your transaction has been successfully broadcasted!
settings.total_balance_explanation: Display the total balance of all your wallets on your home screen widgets.

notifications.would_you_like_to_receive_notifications: Would you like to receive notifications when you get incoming payments?
notifications.no_and_dont_ask: No, and do not ask me again.
notifications.permission_denied_message: You have denied permission to send you notifications. If you would like to receive notifications, please enable them in your device settings.

transactions.cancel_explain: We will replace this transaction with one that pays you and has higher fees. This effectively cancels the current transaction. This is called RBF—Replace by Fee.
transactions.transaction_loading_error: There was an issue loading the transaction. Please try again later.
transactions.cpfp_exp: We will create another transaction that spends your unconfirmed transaction. The total fee will be higher than the original transaction fee, so it should be mined faster. This is called CPFP—Child Pays for Parent.
transactions.enable_offline_signing: This wallet is not being used in conjunction with an offline signing. Would you wish to enable it now?
transactions.open_url_error: Unable to open the link with the default browser. Please change your default browser and try again.
transactions.rbf_explain: We will replace this transaction with one with a higher fee so that it will be mined faster. This is called RBF—Replace by Fee.
transactions.watchOnlyWarningDescription: Be cautious of scammers who often use “watch-only” wallets to deceive users. These wallets do not allow you to control or send funds; they only let you view the balance.

wallets.details_del_wb_q: This wallet has a balance. Before proceeding, please be aware that you will not be able to recover the funds without this wallet’s seed phrase. In order to avoid accidental removal, please enter your wallet’s balance of {balance} satoshis.
wallets.import_passphrase_message: Enter passphrase if you have used any
wallets.import_error: Failed to import. Please make sure that the provided data is valid.
wallets.import_explanation: Please enter your seed words, public key, WIF, or anything you’ve got. BlueWallet will do its best to guess the correct format and import your wallet.
wallets.import_success: Your wallet has been successfully imported.
wallets.import_success_watchonly: Your wallet has been successfully imported. WARNING: This is a watch-only wallet, you can NOT spend from it.
wallets.import_discovery_offline: BlueWallet is currently in offline mode. In this mode, it can't verify the existence of the wallet, so you'll need to select the correct one manually
wallets.import_derivation_subtitle: Enter custom derivation path, and we will try to discover your wallet.

It’s free, and you can create 
as many as you like.
wallets.list_empty_txs1_lightning: Lightning wallet should be used for your daily transactions. Fees are unfairly cheap and the speed is blazing fast.
wallets.list_empty_txs2_lightning: To start using it, tap on Manage Funds and topup your balance.
wallets.no_ln_wallet_error: Before paying a Lightning invoice, you must first add a Lightning wallet.
wallets.looks_like_bip38: This looks like a password-protected private key (BIP38).
wallets.select_no_bitcoin: There are currently no Bitcoin wallets available.
wallets.select_no_bitcoin_exp: A Bitcoin wallet is required to refill Lightning wallets. Please create or import one.
wallets.scan_import: Scan this QR code to import your wallet in another application.
wallets.write_down: Write down and securely store these words. Use them to restore your wallet at a later time.

wallets.copy_ln_public: Copy and securely store this information to restore your wallet at a later time.

multisig.this_is_cosigners_xpub: This is the co-signer’s XPUB—ready to be imported into another wallet. It is safe to share it.
multisig.this_is_cosigners_xpub_airdrop: If you share via AirDrop the receivers have to be in the coordination screen.
multisig.wallet_key_created: Your Vault key was created. Take a moment to safely backup your mnemonic seed.
multisig.are_you_sure_seed_will_be_lost: Are you sure? Your mnemonic seed will be lost if you don’t have a backup.
multisig.forget_this_seed: Forget this seed and use the XPUB instead.
multisig.input_fp_explain: Skip to use the default one (00000000)
multisig.input_path_explain: Skip to use the default one ({default})
multisig.ms_help_title: How Multisig Vaults Work: Tips and Tricks
multisig.ms_help_text: A wallet with multiple keys, for increased security or shared custody
multisig.ms_help_1: The Vault will work with other BlueWallet apps and PSBT compatible wallets, such as Electrum, Specter, Coldcard, Cobo Vault, etc.
multisig.ms_help_2: You can create all Vault keys in this device and remove or edit them later. Having all keys on the same device has the equivalent security of a regular Bitcoin wallet.
multisig.ms_help_3: On the wallet options, you will find your Vault backup and watch-only backup. This backup is like a map to your wallet. It is essential for wallet recovery in case you lose one of your seeds.
multisig.ms_help_4: To import a multisig, use your backup file and the Import feature. If you only have seeds and XPUBs, you can use the individual Import button when creating Vault keys.
multisig.ms_help_5: By default, BlueWallet will generate a 2-of-3 Vault. To create a different quorum or change the address type, activate Advanced Mode in the Settings.

cc.tip: This feature allows you to see, label, freeze or select coins for improved wallet management. You can select multiple coins by tapping on the colored circles.
